templateDmTableSql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bi_dw.dw_schedule_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `user_id` INT ( 10 ) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户id',
                                    `sche_id` INT ( 10 ) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '日程id',
                                    `action` INT ( 2 ) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '1:表示日程添加,2:delete日程删除,3:日程标注完成,4:日程分享',
                                    `app_plat_id` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备',
                                    `app_version_id` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '版本',
                                    `app_id` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '应用id',
                                    `year` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL,
                                    `month` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL,
                                    `day` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL,
                                    `hour` INT ( 4 ) DEFAULT NULL,
                                    `statis_date` INT ( 10 ) DEFAULT NULL,
                                    `schedule_count` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '日程条数',
                                    KEY `idx_dw_schedule_dm_yyyymm` ( `statis_date`, `sche_id` ) USING BTREE 
                                    ) ENGINE = INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
insertDmSelectSql:
insert into bi_dw.dw_schedule_dm_yyyymm (
                                    `user_id` ,
                                    `sche_id` ,
                                    `action` ,
                                    `app_plat_id` ,
                                    `app_version_id` ,
                                    `app_id` ,
                                    `year` ,
                                    `month`,
                                    `day` ,
                                    `hour` ,
                                    `statis_date`,
                                    `schedule_count`
                            )
                            select 
                                    `user_id` ,
                                    `sche_id` ,
                                    `action` ,
                                    `app_plat_id` ,
                                    `app_version_id` ,
                                    `app_id` ,
                                    `year` ,
                                    `month`,
                                    `day` ,
                                    `hour` ,
                                    `statis_date`,
                                    COUNT(1) `schedule_count`
                            from bi_dwd.dwd_schedule_dm_yyyymm 
                                    WHERE 
                            statis_date = ${statis_date}
                            GROUP BY
                                `user_id` ,
                                `sche_id` ,
                                `action` ,
                                `app_plat_id` ,
                                `app_version_id` ,
                                `app_id` ,
                                `year` ,
                                `month`,
                                `day` ,
                                `hour` ,
                                `statis_date`
delete_date: delete from bi_dw.dw_schedule_dm_yyyymm where 1=1 AND statis_date < ${statisDate}
